title: What's the point of xmas if there's no presents?
body:
Srs question?
I've been wondering this since 10th grade, when Santa stopped giving me shit. Around that same time, the entire household stopped giving a fuck about xmas altogether. 
For us, xmas seems to have been strictly about getting things, and sometimes giving things. Without it, it's just another day. Exactly like birthdays tbh. Haven't cared about those since I was ~16 either. 

Discuss
